channel.title: [Neutral Offensive/Support] The Rogue
channel.description:
![Connor-the-post-apocalyptic-assassin-the-dark-assassins-31501803-1280-1024|625x500](upload://dEKKIpZkPHD7ciTLflB4Lgi5hYG.jpg)
> **Only Appears in Unseen Games** > * **Mastery of the Arts (Passive)** - Immunity to Poison > * **Got your back (Night - Infinite uses)** - Guard a player, but only from occupation. Does not protect from an attack > * **Bet you didn't see that one coming (Night - 2 uses)** - Guard a player, if the player gets attacked, the attacker gets killed in their place. Displays the player's death note. > * **Shadow Form (Day - 2 uses after D2)** - Target a player (you may target yourself), they become immune to occupation and redirection until tomorrow.
***Win Condition*** * Survive
The idea behind this guy was kinda like a mercenary that can chose his own side; he can chose to either keep protection on the BD or keep his kill guard on the assassin or nk if you think they're about to get CS'd
Like I always say, always open to suggestions on improvements

item.title: [Neutral Offensive/Support] The Rogue
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Also

Nice answer

Don’t worry about it just keep trying to make classes and you will be fine

Harsh answer

So? You want me to feel pity for you? Before posting a class think about how the abilites would help you.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Alice you make a lot of NK classes make neutral classes…

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Offensive/Support] The Rogue
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Tip for you.

Don’t give a neutral a ability that doesn’t help them complete their Win condition. Sure maybe BD won’t execute you yet evils will attack you cause you help bd by stopping occupation.

These all seems to be here for no reason and they really have no reason to actually be on here.

Read full topic

item.description:
Like I said I’m not good at this shit and lost like half my ideas that I had as I was writing this

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Offensive/Support] The Rogue
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
The Rogue

Mastery of the Arts (Passive) - >Immunity to Poison
Got your back (Night - Infinite uses) - Guard a player, but only from occupation. Does not protect from an attack
Bet you didn’t see that one coming (Night - 2 uses) - Guard a player, if the player gets attacked, the attacker gets killed in their place. Displays the player’s death note.
Shadow Form (Day - 2 uses after D2) - Target a player (you may target yourself), they become immune to occupation and redirection until tomorrow.

Also here’s the better class card Version

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Offensive/Support] The Rogue
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Goal is to survive but has no survivability abilities.
Also is a weaker cw/knight

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral Offensive/Support] The Rogue
item.dc:creator: dlxhazedxlb
item.description:
Only Appears in Unseen Games

  • Mastery of the Arts (Passive) - Immunity to Poison
  • Got your back (Night - Infinite uses) - Guard a player, but only from occupation. Does not protect from an attack
  • Bet you didn’t see that one coming (Night - 2 uses) - Guard a player, if the player gets attacked, the attacker gets killed in their place. Displays the player’s death note.
  • Shadow Form (Day - 2 uses after D2) - Target a player (you may target yourself), they become immune to occupation and redirection until tomorrow.

Win Condition

  • Survive

The idea behind this guy was kinda like a mercenary that can chose his own side; he can chose to either keep protection on the BD or keep his kill guard on the assassin or nk if you think they’re about to get CS’d

Like I always say, always open to suggestions on improvements

Read full topic
